name: Bevy Workshop

postAttachCommand.watcher: cargo watch --ignore wasm --shell 'cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir wasm --out-name workshop --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/bevy_workshop.wasm'

onCreateCommand: curl -L --proto '=https' --tlsv1.2 -sSf https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cargo-bins/cargo-binstall/main/install-from-binstall-release.sh | bash && cargo binstall --no-confirm wasm-bindgen-cli cargo-watch
updateContentCommand: cargo build --target wasm32-unknown-unknown && wasm-bindgen --out-dir wasm --out-name workshop --target web target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/bevy_workshop.wasm
